item.description:
I am hosting a Lobster Cookout for another group I am a member of, The Supper Club in East Haven. We have a few openings left and I wanted to open the invitation to this group. The cookout is being held at my cottage in Old Saybrook this Sunday at 3:00 pm. There is a charge for the event, $32.00, which has to be paid in advance. The deadline for payment is Thursday, July 16 at midnight (sorry for the short notice).

This includes:

Lobster
Clams
Clam Chowder
Corn on the Cob
Potatos
Cole Slaw
Dessert

I will have some soft drinks, ice, cups and coolers available, but other beverages are BYOB.

We held this event last year and it was a great success. Hope you can make it!
item.name: Lobster Cookout in Old Saybrook
